channel.title: Need Help Adding teleports[PI]
channel.description:
need help adding teleports to the mage book tab my aim is needrspshelp we can do this in teamviewer if u can
ALSO IF U CAN DO THIS CAN YOU TRY TO MAKE IT ONLINE
ALSO BEFORE ANY1 MAKES ANY STUPID COMMENTS IV TRIED TUTORIAL I NEED REAL HELP

item.title: Need Help Adding teleports[PI]
item.dc:creator: @knucklescape knucklescape
item.description:
@knucklescape wrote:

How do you make it an interface? Like, on my source there is “rock crabs” instead of monster teleports, and when you click on rock crabs, you teleport to them. I want an interface to show where i can pick rock crabs or island or whatever. How’d you do that? Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Adding teleports[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Nick-World Nick-World
item.description:
@Nick-World wrote:

[quote=“X Entinity X, post:2, topic:386023”]What do you mean by adding teleports?

By making cases have names or by making cases teleport?

If you want cases to have names;

Go into PlayerAssiant.java and search [i]public void handleLoginText() [/i] { underneath the login method add this;
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Monster Teleport”, 13037);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Minigame Teleport”, 13047);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Boss Teleport”, 13055);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Pking Teleport”, 13063);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Skill Teleport”, 13071);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“More Bosses”, 7457);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“More Bosses”, 13089);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Monster Teleport”, 1300);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Minigame Teleport”, 1325);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Boss Teleport”, 1350);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Pking Teleport”, 1382);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Skill Teleport”, 1415);

If you want to make cases teleport;

Go into ClickingButtons.java and search 9190, it should go up to 9194 I think.

		case 9190:
			if (c.teleAction == 1) {
				//rock crabs
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3174, 4268, 0);[/quote]

could you do it for me in teamviewer

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Adding teleports[PI]
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

What do you mean by adding teleports?

By making cases have names or by making cases teleport?

If you want cases to have names;

Go into PlayerAssiant.java and search [i]public void handleLoginText() [/i] { underneath the login method add this;
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Monster Teleport”, 13037);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Minigame Teleport”, 13047);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Boss Teleport”, 13055);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Pking Teleport”, 13063);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Skill Teleport”, 13071);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“More Bosses”, 7457);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“More Bosses”, 13089);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Monster Teleport”, 1300);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Minigame Teleport”, 1325);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Boss Teleport”, 1350);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Pking Teleport”, 1382);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Skill Teleport”, 1415);

If you want to make cases teleport;

Go into ClickingButtons.java and search 9190, it should go up to 9194 I think.

		case 9190:
			if (c.teleAction == 1) {
				//rock crabs
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3174, 4268, 0);

Read full topic
